reviews.review_content:
Gajendran is wonderful!! He's an anthro grad student so even though it's a language class you get tons and tons of cultural history of Tamilnadu.  This is one of the most delightful languages I've ever taken, even though it's for the most part incomprehensible.  
Workload:
Not too bad--simple verb conjugations and copying enless lines of squiggly letters.
